results.content: Presentation & delivery of this course is pretty low quality.  This is basically a code follow-along course which does not really teach much concepts and is not very helpful for a beginner to API Net Core or API's.  There are tons of libraries which are used in this course and hardly any time is spent explaining what they do.  Also, half the course is spent setting up the User login & registration with JWT which seems like a huge waste of time & effort which takes away from the main purpose which is to teach fundamental concepts.  When compared to other Udemy courses I've taken this one is definitely on the lower quality end.

results.content: Totally unprepared for this as I have mainly done c# and SQL but content is superb.

results.content: The challenges are a nice addition to help reinforce the concepts.

results.content: I have several courses from this author and will continue to buy more. This one is exactly what I was looking for to learn how to use .net Core for an API first application.
